Magmeld Emissary Leader Lada:
Nice of You agreed! Then now go to the entrance to the cave for Angel Falls and find the Green giant, who love Bog Spirits. Try to use this Shimmering Crystal. They made of Mica mined in Marmalde. So, in Aden, you cannot get anything like this.
If You use Sparkling Crystals will start around to gather Swamp Spirits.
Catch Swamp Ghost and take it Slake to the Ancient City of Arcan. Then the elder will be favorable to You.
Cats are very suspicious, so You did not manage to find out, if you come with empty hands.
